contents.subTitle: Front-end
contents.text: JavaScript, TypeScript, React, React Native, Next, Redux, HTML, CSS, Sass, Styled Components, WordPress, Firebase.

contents.subTitle: Back-end
contents.text: Node, Express, Koa, Docker, Knex, Sequelize, Prisma, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, Nodemailer, AWS, Socket.io, Jest, Linux, Google Cloud, Strapi, Github Actions, Puppeteer.

about.title: Prepared for an endless learning journey, passionate about technology, programming and especially, evolution and daily growth. Use the QR Code to know more about me

title: PrimeAgro
Management system and report generation for agronomists
texts: Participations: Database modeling; API development; Seed creation; Documentation; Unitary tests; Automatically generating reports in excel; Heat map integrated with Google maps; Creating charts.
Learnings: Improvement in Relational Database knowledge; Google Cloud.

title: Medfy
UMC Hospital Doctors and Clinics Management System
texts: Participations: Database modeling; API creation; Containerization with Docker; Documentation; Uploading files and sending emails with AWS; Frontend development (Tables, dynamic lists, drag-and-drop, etc.); Export data to excel.
Learnings: Next; Docker and its ecosystem; AWS Console.

title: Acelera Prime
Distance learning platform
texts: Participations: Building API and Admin dashboard with Strapi; Documentation; API certificate generation with Puppeteer.
Learnings: Web scraping with Puppeteer; CMS Strapi.

title: OpinaHub
Ratings and feedback system
texts: Participations: Database modeling; API creation; Frontend development; Animations with Framer Motion; Unitary tests; Deploy in Brazil Cloud.
Learnings: Scripts to be inserted into third-party websites; Animations with Framer motion and CSS.

title: Cooperari
Platform to search for candidates by its soft skills
texts: Participations: API development; Integration with Drive to generate reports; Algorithm to match candidates and companies; Automated deployment with Github Actions.

title: Pedi Aqui
Delivery System
texts: Participations: Database modeling; API development; Connection with web sockets; Deploy in heroku; Integration with mobile APP notifications.
